Group (2020-present):

Introduction

Alex is a Korean-German singer best known as a former member of the boy group DRIPPIN under Woollim Entertainment.

He debuted as a member of DRIPPIN on October 28, 2020, with the mini album "Boyager." He promoted with the group for years until January 2023, when Wollim Entertainment announced his hiatus due to health issues. Six months later, in July 2023, it was revealed that Alex left the group and the agency.
